mapper.select: SELECT id, pw, name, tel, bmk_addr_lv1, bmk_addr_lv2, bmk_addr_lv3, bmk_addr_lv4, role FROM user WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET pw = #{pw}, name = #{name}, tel = #{tel}, bmk_addr_lv1 = #{bmk_addr_lv1}, bmk_addr_lv2 = #{bmk_addr_lv2}, bmk_addr_lv3 = #{bmk_addr_lv3}, bmk_addr_lv4 = #{bmk_addr_lv4}, role = #{role} WHERE id = #{id};
